CustomField.description: Campaign Member references a lead that is converted instead of the contact record - member cannot be updated and is considered defective.
CustomField.formula: AND( BEGINS(FCRM__FCR_Lead_Contact_18_Digit_ID__c, '00Q'), OR( Lead.Id = NULL, Lead.IsConverted = True) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Campaign Member references a lead that is converted instead of the contact record - member cannot be updated and is considered defective.
CustomField.label: Admin Defective Member
